questions.question: BROKEN TRACKS
THIS DISNEY LEGEND DESIGNED THE LARGE MOSAIC ON THE CONCOURSE.

THIS RESTAURANT WAS FORMERLY THE FIESTA FOOD AND FUN CENTER.

THIS COMEDIAN ONCE CALLED THE CONTEMPORARY RESORT "WHERE THE GOODYEAR BLIMP GOES FOR MATING SEASON.".

double-jeopardy.name: LET'S JUST PUT STITCH IN IT!

questions.question: WE ALREADY PUT STITCH IN TOMORROWLAND TO LET US ESCAPE FROM THIS ATTRACTION!
WE ALREADY PUT STITCH ON THIS STORE WHERE HE SPITS AT PEOPLE!
WE ALREADY PUT STITCH IN THIS POLYNESIAN RESORT RESTAURANT FOR BREAKFAST!
WE ALREADY PUT STITCH ON THE TOMORROWLAND STAGE FOR THIS RETIRED SHOW!
WE EVEN PUT STITCH ON THE MONORAIL NARRATION IN 2005 INTERRUPTING THIS ANNOUNCER! I GIVE UP!

final-jeopardy.question: IN MARCH 2013, WDWNT.COM POSTED CONCEPT ART AND PLANS FOR THIS MAJOR WALT DISNEY WORLD OVERHAUL PROJECT, NOW IN ITS FINAL PHASE.
